iptables_chain:
# ZK71 Zone 0 (Prime 2)
iptables -N MONSTER_ZONE_0
iptables -A MONSTER_ZONE_0 -m state --state ESTABLISHED,RELATED -j ACCEPT
iptables -A MONSTER_ZONE_0 -p tcp --dport 20000 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A MONSTER_ZONE_0 -m limit --limit 2/sec -j ACCEPT
iptables -A MONSTER_ZONE_0 -j DROP
